item.wom.agony.tooltip:
A light and sharp spear that allows the user to deal deadly blows.
Press the jump button while doing a mid-air attack to perform a slam attack.
skill.wom.agony_plunge.tooltip:
"Disappear into the sky before falling on your enemies."

Attacking enemies will charge this skill up to 3 times.
The damage this deals is multiplied by the number of charges you have left.
item.wom.tormented_mind.tooltip:
A weapon of mass murder and act of abomination.
This axe has absorbed the wrath of its former bearer
and will transmit it into the next.
skill.wom.true_berserk.tooltip:
"May god fear you..."

Makes your skill gauge unreadable.
item.wom.ruine.tooltip:
An ancient weapon, forged with forgotten knowledge and infused with the power of the End.
Its balance and design allows for maximum efficiency and accuracy in combat.
skill.wom.plunder_perdition.tooltip:
"Perform the ancient enderman ritual of stealing from others."

The Enderian power condensed into the crystaline hilt
steals the lifeforce of all enemies within range.
Upon striking enemies, you gain 5% of your max stamina, half a heart (+1 heart per Sweeping Edge level),
and Speed for 10sec x (1 + (Sweeping Edge level)).
The strength of the speed depens on the number of enemies hit.
item.wom.satsujin.tooltip:
A malicious demon is sealed within this blade, strengthening its effectivness
but, as the demon is still sealed, he cannot provide much power.

Passive: Sheath your blade after 4sec of inactivity.
Sheath the blade after a shorter period
at the end of a sheathed attack.
skill.wom.sakura_state.tooltip:
"A thin slash performed in absolute serenity."

On cast, you'll perform a Sakura slash in front of you.
While sprinting, you will quickly pass through enemies in front of you, slashing them along the way.

You can stack a total of 8 sakura slashes.
Each level of Sweeping Edge on your blade will increase this number by 1/3 on the initial draw.

After the initial draw, you'll enter your Serene State.
If you don't draw a Sakura Slash again within 4 seconds, you lose all your
stacked attacks and be released from your Sakura State. Sakura Slashes will automaticaly sheath your blade.

Dash attacks and Sakura dash slashes will put 3 stacks
of perpetual slashes on the enemy (+1 for each Sweeping Edge level).
If no sheathed attack or Sakura Slashes are performed within 1.5s,
Land all perpetual slashes are stacked on the target, cutting them muliple times on all sides.
item.wom.ender_blaster.tooltip:
This weapon has transcended time and space
in order to find someone who can control its power.
skill.wom.ender_blast.tooltip:
"The zenith of the End's technological power."

The blaster loader is composed of 12 chambers.
Kinetic energy is stored within them and transmuted into endpower.
When the trigger is pressed, half of the converted endpower
is condensed into ender bullets.
The other half is transfered into a particle accelerator that overcharges
the endpower until it blasts the bullet out with tremendous force and precision.
All of that in just a fraction of a second... outstanding!
skill.wom.ender_fusion.tooltip:
"The zenith of the End's technological power."

Two blaster loaders with 12 chambers each, for a total of 24.
The kinetic energy stored is shared between both blasters
and transmuted into endpower for each.
When the trigger is pressed, half of the converted endpower
is condensed into ender bullets.
The other half is transfered into a particle accelerator that overcharges
the endpower until it blasts the bullet out with tremendous force and precision.
All of that in just a fraction of a second... outstanding!
item.wom.herrscher.tooltip:
A sharp, light, and greatly offense-based sword that performs very well in combat,
but it seems to need something with great defense in order to reach its full potential...
item.wom.gesetz.tooltip:
A strong, resilient, and greatly defense-based shield that blocks even the strongest attack,
but it seems to need something with stellar offense in order to reach its full potential...
skill.wom.regierung.tooltip:
"Unstoppable offense and unbreakable defense combined in perfect harmony."

 Blocking will stack up damage depending
 on the way you block the attack.
If the player is attacked while the shield is blocking,
they may do a counter-attack.
item.wom.moonless.tooltip: What is a blade without a handle? A light without a shadow? Or a night without a moon?
skill.wom.lunar_echo.tooltip:
"Allows one to call upon the judgement of the lunar arcana."

 Striking foes in front of you and makes them glow for 7sec.
 Hitting glowing enemies blinds them for another 7sec.
 Enemies that are blinded get increased blindness from repeated damage.
 Once the blindness runs out, all of it is
 converted into damage and deals a Lunar Eclipse in a field around them.
 Dealing a jump attack will release this early.
item.wom.antitheus.tooltip:
"Harvests life in the worst way possible."

Attacks have 20% chance to inflict the Wither effect for 6sec.
If the enemy already has Wither effect, then it
reapplies a stronger Wither effect, refreshing the duration.

For each level of Sweeping Edge, there is an increased 10% chance to Wither
your enemies and increase the duration by 2sec.
skill.wom.demonic_ascension.tooltip:
"The scythe takes possession of your body
 and use it to do terrible things..."

Ascension:
 Deals an AOE attack that inflicts Wither,
 also inflicting 50% CATHARIS* on affected enemy.

In Demon form:
 Base Duration is equal to 20s x (1 + (Sweeping Edge level) / 3).
 Dash attacks have twice the chance to apply Wither effect, but
 will consume more and more health if used multiple times.
 Other attacks will cause 80% CATHARSIS* on Withered enemies if they hit.

*CATHARIS: Steals an extra amount of health from an enemy, healing you (based on the CATHARIS percentage)
and increases Demon form duration based on the enemy's level of Wither
(+3s for wither II and +6s for wither III).
item.wom.demon_seal.tooltip: An ancient demon is sealed within.
skill.wom.charybdis.tooltip: Consumes Stamina in order to perform a whirlwind of up to 8 strikes. Sweeping Edge reduces the stamina usage.
skill.wom.ender_step.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Teleports away from danger. While executing this skill, the user becomes immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.ender_obscuris.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Teleports you behind the last hitted target within 30 blocks(in radius from you). While executing this skill, the user becomes immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.shadow_step.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Sinks you in the shadows. Moving within the shadow will twist space and time, making you move faster than the light itself. While executing this skill, the user becomes immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.bull_charge.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Charges forward, pushing away any entity that comes across your path. During the charge, you are immune to being stunned and take 40% less damage
skill.wom.counter_attack.tooltip:
A Perfect Guard will trigger a counter attack based on the held weapon's attack.

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.wom.perfect_bulwark.tooltip:
Holding Guard stance will block attacks from all directions at low progressive stamina cost.
Releasing guard after being hit 5 times will send a shockwave that pushes enemies away. 

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.wom.vengeful_parry.tooltip:
Puts you in a guarding stance for 2sec.
During that time, you block all attacks at no stamina cost.
Afterwards, you'll be able to send back all the damage in your next attack.
Refreshes damage on recast.
1sec cooldown.

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.wom.arrow_tenacity.tooltip: Prevent being stunned from arrows. This skill is permanent, thus you can use another passive on top of it. However, you'll only keep the current passive if you die.
skill.wom.pain_anticipation.tooltip: If no action is performed within 2 sec, you gain the Anticipation effect. This will grant you stun immunity and reduce any damage taken by 40% for the next action for 2 sec.
skill.wom.pain_retribution.tooltip: If no action is performed within 4 sec, you gain the Retribution effect. This will grant you stun immunity and reduce any damage taken by 40% and boost your damage by 60% for the next action for 4 sec.
skill.wom.vampirize.tooltip: Heals you for 10% of the damage you deal.
skill.wom.precise_roll.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Allows for a faster, better, and more stamina-efficient roll. This is the roll of a true expert.
skill.wom.dodge_master.tooltip:
Stamina on success: 3

Stamina on multiple cast: 6

Instinctively dodge a small distance (only if you would take damage after the cast within a window of 0.2s). After each succesful dodge, you can dodge again within a window of 0.35s.
skill.wom.critical_knowledge.tooltip:
Give you a %s%% chance to deal %s%% more damage.
Critical chance is increased by 5%% per level of Fire Protection on your armor. Critical damage is increased by 15%% per level of Blast Protection on your armor.
skill.wom.heart_shield.tooltip:
Gives you 20 shield point that will recover if no action is performed for %ssec at the rate of 1 point every %ssec.

 The rate and delay for shield recovery can be improved with the Protection enchantment.
skill.wom.mindset.tooltip:
While above 80% Health,
you gain Mindset, which increases your damage by 30% and decreases any damage taken by 20%.
skill.wom.adrenaline.tooltip:
"There will be blood!"

While under 20% Health,
you gain Adrenaline, which increases your damage by 60% and decreases damage taken by 40%.
skill.wom.dancing_blade.tooltip:
"Dance upon the sound of death."

Gain 80% damage on every 4th successful attack.
skill.wom.meditation.tooltip:
Sneak for 2 seconds without moving to enter in state of meditation. The longer you meditate the longer the buff you receive.
There are 3 stages of meditation, each giving different effect:

 Stage 1: 40% increased damage.

 Stage 2: 30% increased attack speed, plus Speed I.

 Stage 3: 50% damage reduction, plus Regeneration I
death.attack.timed_katana_slashes: %1$s didn't know that ... he was already dead!
death.attack.perfect_bulkwark_shockwave: %1$s was cast to the spirit world!
death.attack.lunar_eclipse: Lunar ecplise arcana was too much for %1$s.
